data.text: @forsoothsayer Because it'll be fun watching a lot of assholes lose their shit about it for a couple of years? I mean people are still mad about Star Wars, imagine this.
@forsoothsayer Lol, no, but it’s good for diversity.
@forsoothsayer Agree on the cheese and misogyny of course, but I always go watch them as soon as they’re released!.

@forsoothsayer Given how popular the franchise is, it will push the idea of a black star to such places like Asia (the poster for the recent Star Wars, which featured a black actor, had been changed in China and was omitted from it).
@forsoothsayer Pretty much. I always found the James Bond movies to be boring
